email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to offer a freight rate of $50.75 per ton for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel MV Ocean Star (DWT 150,000, LOA 250m) is available for a laycan of October 15-20. Let me know your thoughts. Best regards, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit high compared to the current market. Would you consider $49.50 per ton? Also, can you confirm the vessel’s specifications and any demurrage terms? Cheers, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your feedback. I can bring the rate down to $50.00 per ton, which is competitive given the vessel’s condition and availability. The demurrage rate is $20,000 per day pro rata. MV Ocean Star is fully compliant with all regulations and has a clean inspection record. Let me know if this works for you. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per ton sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the laycan for October 15-20? Also, please confirm the demurrage terms and provide the charter party agreement draft. Thanks, John.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear! The laycan is confirmed for October 15-20. Demurrage terms are $20,000 per day pro rata, with 72 hours of free laytime. I’ll send over the charter party agreement draft by end of day. Best, Sarah.

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. I’ll review the charter party agreement once received. Looking forward to finalizing this. Cheers, John.
